questions.question: Which Japanese Yokai appears as a bald, octopus-headed monk?
questions.lore: The Tako Nyūdō is an octopus yōkai that takes a vaguely humanoid form. Despite looking like a priest, it is actually a giant mollusk in disguise.

questions.question: What specific physical trait distinguishes the Ahuizotl?
options: A hand at the end of its tail
questions.lore: The Ahuizotl uses the hand on its tail to snatch prey from the water's edge. It resembles a dog or beaver but is far more menacing.

questions.question: According to Uncanny Coffee Hour lore, why doesn't Mitch drink the coffee?
questions.lore: Despite co-hosting a coffee podcast, poor Mitch is allergic to the bean itself. A tragic irony.

questions.question: In Irish folklore, what type of creature is 'Saoirse'?
questions.lore: A Púca is a shape-shifter from Celtic folklore, known for being a trickster spirit that can bring both good and bad fortune.

questions.question: What is the best way to ward off a standard malevolent spirit?
questions.lore: Iron represents the strength of the earth, and salt is a purifier. Most entities find this combination quite distasteful.

questions.question: Who is the other main co-host alongside Odd Bob?
questions.lore: Dr. Kitsune brings an academic and Native perspective to the chaos of the Coffee Hour.

questions.question: The 'Fresno Nightcrawler' is a modern cryptid famous for resembling which object?
questions.lore: First captured on CCTV in Fresno, California, these entities appear to be nothing more than a pair of long, white legs walking on their own with no torso.

questions.question: How can one defeat a Kappa without using violence?
questions.lore: Kappas are obsessively polite. If you bow to them, they are compelled to bow back, causing the life-sustaining water in the dish on their head to spill out.

questions.question: What happens if you spill salt?
questions.lore: Superstition dictates you must throw a pinch over your left shoulder to blind the devil waiting there.

questions.question: Which cryptid is known for its moth-like wings and red eyes?
questions.lore: Mothman of Point Pleasant, WV, is famous for his glowing red eyes and predicting disasters.
